com.ece.superkids.questions

Interface QuestionDatabase

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FileQuestionDatabase

    public interface QuestionDatabase
    The QuestionDatabase allows access to the list of questions
    Author:
    Ben Duong

    • Method Detail

      • getQuestion

        Question getQuestion(QuestionLevel level,
                   QuestionCategory category,
                   int number)
        Get a question in a given level and category.
        Parameters:
        level - the question level
        category - the question category
        number - the question index
        Returns:
        The question of the index in the level and category.

      • getNumberOfQuestions

        int getNumberOfQuestions(QuestionLevel level,
                       QuestionCategory category)
        Get the number of questions in a given category.
        Parameters:
        level - the question level
        category - the question category
        Returns:
        The number of questions stored in the database in the given category

      • getNumberOfQuestions

        int getNumberOfQuestions(QuestionLevel level)
        Get the total number of questions in a given level.
        Parameters:
        level - the question level
        Returns:
        The number of questions loaded that are in the given level

      • switchMode

        void switchMode(QuestionMode mode)
        Load a different set of questions.
        Parameters:
        mode - the mode to reload the database in

      • getQuestionNumber

        int getQuestionNumber(Question question)
        Get the index of a given question.
        Parameters:
        question - the question
        Returns:
        The index of the question in its level and category. -1 if not found.
